text: The 1963 Norwegian Football Cup was the first all-Norwegian cup, as it was the first year clubs from Northern Norway were allowed to participate in the cup. Of the two northern Norwegian teams that participated this year, Bodø/Glimt made it all the way to the fourth round. The surprise team of the cup this year was Sagene, a team that made it to the quarter final, despite playing in the third division (tier three). Skeid won the cup, beating Fredrikstad 2-1 in the final. ==Final three rounds== ==See also== *1963 Norwegian First Division ==References== *http://www.rsssf.no/1963/Cup.html Category:Norwegian Football Cup seasons Norway Football Cup
title: 1963 Norwegian Football Cup
